about_the_game:
Representation of SP AC4400s between the years 1998-2004. Cabs are exactly created to prototype specs including 2 cab radios and GE/Harris LOCOTROL IV equipment.

Features

  • Includes Skin changer with 4 different skins
  • Realistic Specular/normal map texture effects
  • Air Hoses and MU Cables
  • Functioning and interactive computer screen
  • Functioning dynamic brakes
  • Auto Running Numbers
  • Road specific highly detailed cab view
  • Scripted cab functions
  • Flashing Ditchlights
  • Realistic in-cab sounds
  • Night lighting
  • Openable engine compartment doors,
  • Openable Front and Rear cab doors,
  • Highest qualify GE 7FDL engine sound recording in Trainz
detailed_description:
Representation of SP AC4400s between the years 1998-2004. Cabs are exactly created to prototype specs including 2 cab radios and GE/Harris LOCOTROL IV equipment.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
